createDialog.title: Create New Organization

createDialog.slugHelper: Used in URLs. Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only.

inviteDialog.description: Send an invitation to join your organization.

settings.title: Organization Settings

settings.deleteOrganizationDescription: Permanently delete this organization and all its data

confirmRemoveMember: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the organization?
